CustomField.description: CC BWRD Time to Value Weighted Score Auto
CustomField.formula: CASE( Time_to_Value__c, '(1) More than 2 years', 1 * Time_to_Value_Weight__c, '(2) 2 years or less', 2 * Time_to_Value_Weight__c, '(3) 18 months or less', 3 * Time_to_Value_Weight__c, '(4) 1 year or less', 4 * Time_to_Value_Weight__c, '(5) 6 months or less', 5 * Time_to_Value_Weight__c, 0)
CustomField.label: Time to Value for Buyer Weighted Score
